channel.title: Pure to main
channel.description:
Well, I've decided to quit being a pure on runescape. I've got nearly 50mill, and well, I'm not that good of a pker.
My stats are 76 Strength 1 Defense [will take me an hour with monkey madness exp and rune plate quest [forgot name] to get 50 def]] 60 Attack 43 Prayer 41 Range 42 Mage 81 Mining [just to throw it in there]
I would like to get 85 Strength 80 Defense 80 Attack 60 Prayer 75 Range 70 Mage
w/o no lifeing. Can anyone give me an estimate on how long this would take? With best training options. [Right now I do rock crabs, going to switch over to] [Also, what monsters drop some good loot for decent combat stats?]

item.title: Pure to main
item.dc:creator: @maminerr maminerr
item.description:
@maminerr wrote:

[quote=“cows_be_sacred, post:11, topic:314130”][quote author=maminerr link=topic=410609.msg3029498#msg3029498 date=1258259067]
85 Strength, 80 Defense and 80 Attack: this can all be done at once if youre patient, get your attack to 70 using a d scim and then use a whip to train all three stats. if you’ve done desert treasure and want fast xp you can kill there skele’s in the ‘invisible dungeon’ rock crabs are also good as theyre east to kill and have alot of hp, another option is training slayer with your cb stats or if you have high enough skill levels and have finished enough quests i suggest you do defender of varrock and kill armoured zombies. i got 98-99str there in under 15hrs and you can pray or afk train
60 Prayer: gilded altar and d bones obviously
75 Range: throwing knives on yaks.
70 Mage: alch, it is hard to find an item you wont lose alot of money on, i suggest looking at pouches and then looking at yew longs.
[/quote]
Hmmm, this seems good. I’m thinking of completing the quest for experiments and training there because they’re 400 exp each.[/quote]

i forgot about those lol
my pure friend did them until 99 str and it didnt take him long at all
id go with that then

Read full topic

item.title: Pure to main
item.dc:creator: @cows_be_sacred cows_be_sacred
item.description:
@cows_be_sacred wrote:

[quote=“Phineas, post:12, topic:314130”][quote]I would like to get
85 Strength
80 Defense
80 Attack
60 Prayer
75 Range
70 Mage[/quote]

Imo 2 weeks if you play 5 hours + a day, if not maybe 1 month
2 Months, if you stay dedicated
1-2 weeks depending on how long you play
2-3 weeks
2-4 weeks if dedicated
1-2 weeks cause magic is not hard to train, especially to 70[/quote]
Yeah I’m not sure I can spend that much time. Maybe 3 hours a day.

Read full topic

item.title: Pure to main
item.dc:creator: @Not_X_A_Alex Not X A Alex
item.description:
@Not_X_A_Alex wrote:

[quote=“cows_be_sacred, post:8, topic:314130”][quote author=Not X A Alex link=topic=410609.msg3029293#msg3029293 date=1258244312]
use dragon bones on alter i got 20 prayer to 43 to 52 in like two days

but then again i did buy all the bones so
[/quote]
I can get 43 - 60 in less than an hour. Unless I need to hop worlds for altar. It’s really quite easy.
I’m mainly focusing on the combat stats[/quote]
41 range to 75 is going to take like 2 weeks if you don’t no life it or bot

get your range to 50 then go to fire giants

Eh Pretty Easy:

O well, you could - after finishing mm - train def at the island near the prayer altar.

What island is this and what type of creatures are they? And how much exp?
+Guys I can train a good 2-3 Hours a day. And if anybody would mind to post some quests that are good for any combat exp.

item.description:
@cows_be_sacred wrote:

Niall:

No idea about prayer(as I only ever got 53) but I’d day 2-3 months at least, it really depends on how long you play and how fast you can get xp.

Prayer is actually quite easy, I’ll just use dbones @ someones house.

@ Eh
I’m not going to risk botting :s

item.title: Pure to main
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Prayer: dragon bones
Magic: rsbot, curse the dummies in lumbridge (cheapest way)
Ranged: cannon
Bot the rest, too. I got 78-90 str in a week botting at tzhaar caves - that was when I used to play.
